item.title: Project 2: Web Scraping Ulta Skin Care
item.description: Background Ulta Beauty is notably known for carrying various cosmetic, fragrance, and skincare products. This web scraping project explores the skincare segmentation, and the products and characteristics of each category. The picture above outlines the products that make up a basic skincare routine, including cleansers, moisturizers, sunscreen, serums, toners, essences, and treatments. Skincare Categories Ulta carries more Moisturizer products, followed by Treatment & Serums and Cleansers. These make up the top 3 skincare categories in Ulta’s inventory.
